title: Bristol
subtitle: A city in the West
textOne: Bristol is a city and county in South West England with a population of 454,200[5] in 2016. The district has the 10th-largest population in England.[6] According to data from 2015, the city itself is the 8th-largest by population in the UK.[7] The city borders North Somerset and South Gloucestershire, with the cities of Bath and Gloucester to the south-east and north-east, respectively.
